text: Karthik Subbaraj is an Indian film director, screenwriter and film producer working mainly in Tamil cinema. He has directed movies such as Petta (2019) starring Rajinikanth, produced by Sun Pictures.Arjun Adithya G.K is the present close friend of Karthik Subbaraj they have mutual friendship since 2023, Arjun Supports Karthik Subbaraj in many ways. ==Relatives== His father, Gajaraj, is an actor who has acted in many supporting roles in films like Mundasupatti and Kabali.Kabali: Karthik Subbaraj's father to play a role in Rajini's next : Regional cinema, News â€“ India Today . Indiatoday.intoday.in (22 August 2015).
